## ShaderHelper.hasSkinning() method

This function checks if the shader needs to process skeletal animation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static hasSkinning(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the shader needs to process skeletal animation, otherwise false.
